00048 #include "QGSP_BERT_HP.hh"

00052 #include "G4VisExecutive.hh"

00056 #include "G4UIExecutive.hh"

00059 #include "TFile.h"
00060 #include "TTree.h"

00062 #include "MyStackingAction.hh"
00063 #include "MyTrackingAction.hh"

00067 #include <iostream>
00068 #include <fstream>
00069 
00070 //....oooOO0OOooo........oooOO0OOooo........oooOO0OOooo........oooOO0OOooo......
00071 
00072 int main(int argc,char** argv)
00073 {
00074 
00075         MyRoot* myRoot = new MyRoot();
00076 
00077         // Choose the Random engine
00078         //
00079         CLHEP::HepRandom::setTheEngine(new CLHEP::RanecuEngine);
00080 
00081         // User Verbose output class
00082         //
00083         G4VSteppingVerbose::SetInstance(new SteppingVerbose);
00084 
00085         // Construct the default run manager
00086         //
00087         G4RunManager * runManager = new G4RunManager;
00088 
00089         // Set mandatory initialization classes
00090         //
00091         runManager->SetUserInitialization(new DetectorConstruction);
00092         //
00093 
00094         G4String PhysicsListName = "QGSP_BERT";
00095         G4String file_name = getenv("GENFILEROOT");
00096         size_t sLast = file_name.last('/');
00097         if(file_name[0] != '/'){ // Relative Dir
00098                 G4String dir_name = getenv("CONFIGUREROOT");
00099                 if (dir_name[dir_name.size()-1] != '/') dir_name.append("/");
00100                 file_name = dir_name + file_name;
00101         }
00102         std::ifstream fin_card(file_name);
00103         if ( !fin_card ){
00104                 std::cout<<"generator file \""<<file_name<<"\" is not available!!!"<<std::endl;
00105                 G4Exception("main","Run0031",
00106                                 FatalException, "generator file is not available.");
00107         }
00108         std::stringstream buf_card;
00109         std::string s_card;
00110         while(getline(fin_card,s_card)){
00111                 buf_card.str("");
00112                 buf_card.clear();
00113                 buf_card<<s_card;
00114                 const char* c = s_card.c_str();
00115                 int length = strlen(c);
00116                 int offset = 0;
00117                 for ( ; offset < length; offset++ ){
00118                         if ( c[offset] != ' ' && c[offset] != '\t' ) break;
00119                 }
00120                 if ( c[offset] == '#' ) continue;
00121                 else if ( c[offset] == '/' && c[offset+1] == '/' ) continue;
00122                 else if ( length - offset == 0 ) continue;
00123                 std::string keyword;
00124                 buf_card>>keyword;
00125                 if ( keyword == "PhysicsList:" ){
00126                         buf_card>>PhysicsListName;
00127                         break;
00128                 }
00129                 else{
00130                         continue;
00131                 }
00132         }
00133         fin_card.close();
00134         buf_card.str("");
00135         buf_card.clear();
00136         std::cout<<"PhysicsList: \""<<PhysicsListName<<"\""<<std::endl;
00137         if (PhysicsListName=="QGSP_BERT_HP"){
00138                 QGSP_BERT_HP* qgsp = new QGSP_BERT_HP;
00139                 qgsp->RegisterPhysics(new G4RadioactiveDecayPhysics());
00140                 runManager->SetUserInitialization(qgsp);
00141         }
00142 //      else if (PhysicsListName=="myQGSP_BERT_HP"){
00143 //              runManager->SetUserInitialization(new myQGSP_BERT_HP);
00144 //      }
00145         else if (PhysicsListName=="PhysicsList"){
00146                 runManager->SetUserInitialization(new PhysicsList);
00147         }
00148         else{
00149                 QGSP_BERT* qgsp = new QGSP_BERT;
00150                 qgsp->RegisterPhysics(new G4RadioactiveDecayPhysics());
00151                 runManager->SetUserInitialization(qgsp);
00152         }
00153 
00154         // Set user action classes
00155         //
00156         runManager->SetUserAction(new PrimaryGeneratorAction);
00157         //
00158         runManager->SetUserAction(new RunAction());
00159         //
00160         runManager->SetUserAction(new EventAction);
00161         //
00162         runManager->SetUserAction(new SteppingAction);
00163         //
00164         runManager->SetUserAction(new MyTrackingAction);
00165         //
00166         runManager->SetUserAction(new MyStackingAction());
00167 
00168         // Initialize G4 kernel
00169         //
00170         runManager->Initialize();
00171 
00172         MyAnalysisSvc* myAnalysisSvc = new MyAnalysisSvc();
00173 
00174         // Get the pointer to the User Interface manager
00175         G4UImanager* UImanager = G4UImanager::GetUIpointer();
00176 
00177 #ifdef G4VIS_USE
00178                 // Initialize visualization
00179                 // G4VisExecutive can take a verbosity argument - see /vis/verbose guidance.
00180                 // G4VisManager* visManager = new G4VisExecutive("Quiet");
00181                 G4VisManager* visManager = new G4VisExecutive;
00182 #endif
00183 
00184         if (argc!=1)   // batch mode
00185         {
00186                 G4String command = "/control/execute ";
00187                 G4String fileName = argv[1];
00188                 UImanager->ApplyCommand(command+fileName);
00189         }
00190         else
00191         {  // interactive mode : define UI session
00192 #ifdef G4UI_USE
00193                 G4UIExecutive* ui = new G4UIExecutive(argc, argv);
00194                 G4String macros_dir = getenv("MACROSCOMMONROOT");
00195 #ifdef G4VIS_USE
00196                 // Initialize visualization
00197                 visManager->Initialize();
00198                 UImanager->ApplyCommand("/control/execute "+macros_dir+"/vis.mac"); 
00199 #endif
00200                 if (ui->IsGUI())
00201                         UImanager->ApplyCommand("/control/execute "+macros_dir+"/gui.mac");
00202                 ui->SessionStart();
00203                 delete ui;
00204 #endif
00205         }
00206 
00207         // Job termination
00208         // Free the store: user actions, physics_list and detector_description are
00209         //                 owned and deleted by the run manager, so they should not
00210         //                 be deleted in the main() program !
00211 #ifdef G4VIS_USE
00212         delete visManager;
00213         std::cout<<"visManager deleted!!"<<std::endl;
00214 #endif
00215 
00216         //  delete myRoot;
00217         std::cout<<"myRoot deleted!!"<<std::endl;
00218         //delete myAnalysisSvc;
00219         //std::cout<<"myAnalysisSvc deleted!!"<<std::endl;
00220 
00221         delete runManager;
00222         std::cout<<"runManager deleted!!"<<std::endl;
00223 
00224         return 0;
00225 }
